tasks.name: Resting-state functional MRI
tasks.definition: Investigating the effects of donepezil on local brain activity in AD patients using regional homogeneity (ReHo) during resting-state fMRI scans.
contrasts: Post-intervention AD patients had reduced ReHo in the orbital part of the inferior frontal gyrus
Pre-intervention AD patients had reduced ReHo in the orbital part of the right inferior frontal gyrus

tasks.name: Pattern recognition models
tasks.definition: Developing models to predict the efficacy of donepezil intervention in AD patients based on ReHo values in abnormal brain regions.
contrasts: Pre-intervention ReHo values in abnormal brain regions were 76% accurate for predicting the efficacy of donepezil on cognitive function
Pre-intervention ReHo values in abnormal brain regions were 65% accurate for predicting the efficacy of donepezil on depressive symptoms
